content: > this pattern is available for ** free on > my blog here 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed > for sale contains the full pattern > including important notes stitch > guide written instructions and > photo-tutorial in one printable file without advertisements both in english us and dutch april showers mandala was created for simy s studio challenge in april i designed a crocheted piece inspired by a digital illustration after finished design was revealed i received huuuuuge number of messages asking for a pattern and finally here it is **you ll need ** ~ sport/dk yarn in 5 colors i used stone washed yarn by scheepjes and my shades are 801 moon stone 15g - 1 skein 814 crystal quartz 45g 1 skein 805 blue apatite 30g 1 skein 813 amazonite 75g 2 skeins and 802 smokey quartz 35g 1 skein all amounts are approximate and if you gauge differs a lot you might need more yarn ~ 4mm crochet hook ~ yarn needle to weave in ends **size ** finished mandala is approx 70cm/27 5 large measured from point to point - made with sport/dk yarn and 4mm hook make-a-long will consist of 3 parts links will be added after each part is released part 1 may 10th 2019 2 central overlay medallion part 2 may 17th 2019 3 first lacy frame part 3 may 24th 2019 4 second lacy frame and border 1 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/05/april-showers-mandala-mal-make-long html 2 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/05/april-showers-mandala-mal-part-1 html 3 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/05/april-showers-mandala-mal-part-2 html 4 https //www lillabjorncrochet com/2019/05/april-showers-mandala-mal-part-3 html
